mapper.select: select count(*) from sgWorld where 1=1 and regByMm = #{infrMmSeq}
select count(*) from sgWorld where 1=1 and sgwLink = #{sgwLink}

select s.sgwSeq ,m.infrMmSeq ,m.infrMmNickname ,a.avatarSeq ,a.avatarName from sgWorld s left join sgWorldRoom r on s.sgwSeq = r.sgwSeq left join infrMember m on s.regByMm = m.infrMmSeq left join sgWorldAvatar a on r.avatarSeq = a.avatarSeq where 1=1 and m.infrMmSeq = #{infrMmSeq}
select s.sgwSeq ,s.sgwTitle ,s.sgwMap ,s.sgwMmNumber ,s.isHidden ,s.sgwLink ,s.regDateTime ,s.regByMm from sgWorld s where 1=1 and s.sgwLink = #{sgwLink}
select count(*) usersNum,s.sgwLink from sgWorldRoom sr left join sgWorld s on sr.sgwSeq = s.sgwSeq where sgwLink = #{sgwLink};
select regByMm ,sgwLink from sgWorld where 1=1 and regByMm = #{infrMmSeq}

select s.sgwSeq ,s.sgwLink ,r.infrMmSeq ,m.infrMmNickname ,r.avatarSeq ,count(*) as usersNum from sgWorld s left join sgWorldRoom r on s.sgwSeq = r.sgwSeq left join infrMember m on r.infrMmSeq = m.infrMmSeq where s.sgwLink = #{endPoint}

select s.sgwSeq ,r.infrMmSeq ,m.infrMmNickname ,r.avatarSeq from sgWorld s left join sgWorldRoom r on s.sgwSeq = r.sgwSeq left join infrMember m on r.infrMmSeq = m.infrMmSeq where r.infrMmSeq = #{infrMmSeq}
select infrMmSeq ,infrMmNickname from infrMember where infrMmSeq = #{infrMmSeq}
mapper.delete: delete from sgWorld where 1=1 and regByMm = #{infrMmSeq};
